name: The Cave (itch) (Olon1993)
description: The Cave is the first game I've attempted to create. Its certainly not a full game, more of a prototype, but its my first step toward my dream of becoming a video game developer! I would love to hear some constructive criticism and if you can recommend books, videos, sites, or other resources for refining my craft I would love to hear about it! Thank you for playing my game!
